title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: the easiest way to get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same features as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model support, file uploads, and RAG.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter: ingest PDFs → Chroma → Ollama embeddings → chat.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app to bring Ollama completions into any channel or DM.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that wires Ollama with session memory and model picker.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and retry middleware.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama demonstrating HTTP requests with the standard library only.
